Journal names have been intentionally excluded. Lab member names are in bold and co-first authors indicated with \*. Links are provided to the published article and when possible an open-access version (pre- or post-print) of the paper. 
Click on a triangle for the article abstract.

```{r pubs_render, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
pubs <- read.csv("data/pubs.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

for (section in unique(pubs$section)) {
  cat(sprintf("### %s\n\n", section))
  subset <- pubs[pubs$section == section, ]
  subset <- subset[order(subset$order), ]
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(subset))) {
    cat(subset$details_html[i], "\n\n")
  }
}
```
